project_path.BOGECOIN: contracts/BOGECOIN  Full Smart Contract Security Audit/BOGECOIN

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions `includeAccount()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that can lead to OUT_OF_GAS exceptions if there are long excluded addresses lists.
findings.location: Functions `includeAccount()` and `_getCurrentSupply` in the BOGECOIN contract
